meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Finland.
meanings.sent1: In Finland, you can use finmarks to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for finmarks at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel collected acorns to trade for shiny finmarks.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a pocketful of colorful finmarks.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cash register rang with the jingle of finmarks.

meanings.definition: Marks or signs made with a pen or pencil.
meanings.sent1: She left tiny finmarks on the paper as she doodled.
meanings.sent2: The artist's sketch was filled with intricate finmarks.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left finmarks all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: His signature was a series of elegant finmarks on the document.
meanings.sent5: The detective carefully examined the finmarks left at the crime scene.
